      • findRevertable

        public UpgradeEntity findRevertable(long clusterId)
        Gets the only revertable upgrade if one exists. By definition, only the most recent RepositoryType#PATCH or RepositoryType#MAINT upgrade which doesn't have a downgrade already is revertable.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - the cluster id
        Returns:
        the upgrade which can be reverted, or null if not found

      • findRevertableUsingJPQL

        public UpgradeEntity findRevertableUsingJPQL(long clusterId)
        Gets the only revertable upgrade if one exists. By definition, only the most recent RepositoryType#PATCH or RepositoryType#MAINT upgrade which doesn't have a downgrade already is revertable.

        This method tries to use some fancy SQL to do the work instead of relying on columns to be set correctly.

        Parameters:
        clusterId - the cluster id
        Returns:
        the upgrade which can be reverted, or null if not found

        public UpgradeEntity merge(UpgradeEntity upgradeEntity)
